content:
ACL Protocol

  • Provides a specification for how to perform access control via HTTP

    • Authors: Paul Leach, Yaron Goland
    • Latest revision: draft-ietf-webdav-acl-00 (11/97)

  • WebDAV ACL issues are new and not well understood, and active participation from the WG is strongly encouraged

    • Discussion of this draft should help firm up ACL requirements
